text:
Hello again :blush:
Do we have any control over the Section and Column options that seems to be very built in to how things work:
Is it possible to for example remove some of these options? I haven't found any `fields.json` file in the boilerplate or in HubSpots theme that expose these options for editing
No, it is not possible to edit those at the moment
Our designers will rip their hair out :sweat_smile:
They don't like it when customers can control paddings etc
They have seen to much strange results from previous projects
however, that is only for the sections, so if the modules are really strict in terms of customisation, i feel like the "chaos" can be somewhat limited / be controlled for such clients.
